about_the_game:
This game is a virtual aquarium petri dish.

Pick whichever description speaks to your <3:

1. You get to design virtual lifeforms - their bodies, nervous cells, muscle fibers.

Train their self-learning AI, carry out experiments in a 3D physics simulation, in real time, on your PC.

If they then survive in a shared environment, amongst species made by other players,

Your organisms get to spread to thousands of other singleplayer worlds...and you get a cut of everything they eat to make even more creatures!

We are planning to enable PVP multiplayer in the next update, which means duelling with other players by sending virtual viruses to each other!

2. You are tasked with growing and developing a virtual ecosystem.

You will create safe, warm currents to grow digital jellyfish,

Architect growbeds for virtual seaweed, safe hunting grounds for baby sharks,

Select species of plants and predators that coexist well together...watch your digital ecosystem flourish!

Oh, and every process mechanic is physically represented - you need to fly through

space to explore multiplayer, send spacecraft carrying your organisms' genetic material

to infect other players with it, seek energy sources to power your experiments...

| Join our Discord to participate in development;

| Check our YouTube for instructional videos if you want to try AI-training.

name: soul Interface

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This game is a virtual aquarium \ evolution sim. Grow \ design virtual lifeforms, experiment, watch them compete for survival in a shared environment, spread them across space to other singleplayer worlds....<3
